I appreciate the upload, but I have to say the video quality is dismal. I don't know what others are watching this on, but I burned it to a DVD and tried to watch on my 52 inch TV. The picture is heavily pixelated and all but unwatchable. I expected a 4gb download to approach DVD quality. I wouldn't even watch this on a small computer screen.
And I appreciate your review, but what you mean is that it is "all but watchable", no?

I burned the movie to dvd and tried to watch it on my 48 inch hdtv and was very disappointed. tossed the disk, but I did finish uploading to 110%.
I will wait for a dvd version instead of the screener.
Thank you for the upload though rocco64.
